text: Tried 3 items from the food menu and two smoothies. My whole family was pleased. Smoothies seemed a bit pricey but food was reasonable.

Unfortunately I have to update this review with a negative incident.  I ordered the chickpea salad sandwich and when I got home I noticed it had romaine lettuce.  There was recently a NATIONWIDE RECALL on lettuce!  When I called to ask if I could bring my sandwich back I was rudely told "no", and the romaine lettuce was listed on the menu.  When I asked her if she knew about the recall from the CDC she had no idea what I was talking about.  How does a restaurant not know about nationwide food recalls?    When I asked to speak with the manager, she told me she  as the co-owner.  The rudeness is one thing, but compromising a customers health is unacceptable.
Had the Madonna mango smoothie ...sooo good!
OMG LETTUCE IM GONNA DIE!  Never eaten here but the only review cant be from some person who loves the food but is scared of lettuce.
